description: Run the unit tests for the execution engine enhancements to ensure functional correctness.

instructions: Navigate to the project root directory.
Execute the unit tests for the execution engine by running the command: `pytest tests/unit/test_execution_engine.py`.
Verify the output to confirm that all tests within `tests/unit/test_execution_engine.py` pass successfully.
constraints: Do not modify any code files.
Only use the `pytest` command to run the tests.
validation_criteria: All tests in tests/unit/test_execution_engine.py pass successfully.
